title: Roblox PS4 Overlay
body: Replaces Roblox's Xbox Buttons by the OFFICIAL Roblox PS4 Buttons.
creator: GordonFreemanMakesCoolMods on Gamebanana

title: Peak Avatar editor
body: Replaces the avatar editor scenes with a hexagon pedestal and floating particles in an empty void. Compatible with both R6 and R15 avatars
creator: dynai on Gamebanana

title: Black N White emote wheel
body: A texture modification that makes the emote wheel black and white (black body white outlines) comes with a special version that has my fursona in the middle of it.
creator: Bandy :3 on Gamebanana

title: Red jesus when you take damage
creator: bizzarblitz on Discord or Github

title: Modern Classic Cursor
body: Combines the look of the old cursor with the current one!
creator: average_artist10 on Discord
